title: Authors and Citation
text: HLina BL (2024). nichetools: complementary package nicheROVER. R package version 0.1.0, https://benjaminhlina.github.io/nichetool/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {nichetools: complementary package to {nicheROVER}},   author = {Benjamin L. HLina},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://benjaminhlina.github.io/nichetool/}, }

title: complementary package to {nicheROVER}
text: {nichetools} complementary package {nicheROVER)} allows user extract Bayesian estimates data objects created {nicherover} (e.g., niche size similarities).

title: complementary package to {nicheROVER}
text: can install development version nichetools using following:

title: Hello, World! — hello
code: hello() #> Error in hello(): could not find function "hello"

what: Create ellipses based on Bayesian estimates — sigma_ellipse
title: Create ellipses based on Bayesian estimates — sigma_ellipse
text: function allows user supply Bayesian estimates mu sigma create estimated Bayesian ellipse niche region.

title: Create ellipses based on Bayesian estimates — sigma_ellipse
code: sigma_ellipse(   dat_mu,   dat_sigma,   name = "sample_name",   number = "sample_number",   mu_name = "mu_est",   isotope_a = "cal_d15n",   isotope_b = "cal_d13c",   p_ell = NULL )

title: Create ellipses based on Bayesian estimates — sigma_ellipse
text: dat_mu data frame containing mu Bayesian estimates. data frame needs long format mu estimate isotope stacked top . dat_sigma data frame containing sigma Bayesian estimates. data frame needs wide format sigma/covariance matrices stacked onto . name character string column name grouping used (e.g, species) create mu sigma Bayesian estimates. name dat_muand dat_sigma. Defaults "sample_name". number character string column name Bayesian estimate. name dat_muand dat_sigma. Defaults "sample_number". mu_name character string column name mu estimate dat_mu. Defaults "mu_est". isotope_a character string column name first isotope. name dat_muand dat_sigma. Defaults "cal_d15n". isotope_b character string column name first isotope. name dat_muand dat_sigma. Defaults "cal_d13c".

title: Create ellipses based on Bayesian estimates — sigma_ellipse
text: data frame containing 100 estimates sample_number sample_name. function runs, produce progress bars tell user step . last step complete processes return total time function ran.
